Title: SpecsFor - Yet Another BDD Framework For .NET
Description: SpecsFor is another Behavior-Driven Development framework that focuses on ease of use for *developers* by minimizing testing friction.

SpecsFor now has an official homepage.  Be sure to check it out at SpecsFor.com!
